'''Adam Hornblower''' was a smith in [[Hobbiton]] in the precursor of the chapter ''[[The Shadow of the Past]]'' of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', which, at the time of the writing was called ''[[Of Gollum and the Ring]]''.<ref name="Shadow">{{RS|Gollum}}</ref>

He was mentioned by [[Gandalf]] in conversation with [[Frodo]], about how nothing could melt [[The One Ring]].<ref name="Shadow"/>
